summary: The diff implements the requested admin credential change end-to-end: backend default password is now exactly "joana 123" and backend comparison preserves internal spaces; the frontend hook trims only leading/trailing whitespace (preserving internal spaces) before calling `verifyAdminLogin`.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a backend state migration module and wired `backend/main.mo` to use it to overwrite `adminPassword` to "joana 123" on migration.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest allowed adding `backend/migration.mo` only if strictly required for upgrades, but no requirement explicitly requested adding/wiring a migration system; this is additional implementation beyond the stated requirements.
